.. published: 2025-07-14 00:00:00 UTC
.. subtitle: The syndicated publishing platform Rivista Voyager
.. summary:
   Rivista Voyager is a decentralized and multi-protocol publishing system for
   ActivityPub, Gemini, HTTP, and XMPP, which jointly utilizes the advanced
   publishing capabilities of The Atom Syndication Format and the federated XMPP
   communications network.

   The purpose of this index is to inform of the software and technologies of
   Gemini, Nostr, RSS, Twtxt, and XMPP, which have common chracteristics with
   Rivista.
